detail_desc: Metal snake chain necklace with large plastic beads in various designs. Adjustable length approx. 49-57 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless bodysuit in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with buttons on the shoulders and at the crotch.
Polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Hooded jumper in a soft, fine knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and high slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Short, three-strand metal necklace. Adjustable length, 31-39 cm.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Rigid metal necklace in a stylish design.
Shirt jacket in soft, felted fabric with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets, discreet pockets in the side seams and cuffs with a slit and press-stud. Lined.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves with pleated, buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt and a pleated skirt with an overlocked hem. Partly lined.

Soft, non-wired bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short skirt in imitation suede with a high waist and concealed zip. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with a U-shaped decoration at the top, detachable strap at the back of the neck and a concealed silicone trim at the top.
All-in-one suit in lightweight velour with appliqués, a hood and a zip with a chin guard at the front. Narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Gently flared blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Gathered seams on the shoulders and lower section, decorative, gathered ties at the front, darts at the back and a button at the cuffs.

Short dress in an airy, softly draping viscose weave with a gathered, stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short top in jersey crêpe with lace trims. Narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Jersey-lined corduroy trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and one back pocket.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets, seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Ribbed, off-the-shoulder top in fine-knit stretch fabric with short sleeves.
Shorts in cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Blouse in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and cotton weave with a V-neck and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring. Crocheted lace trims at the front and hems.
Chinos in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs.
Vest top and a pair of sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Vest top with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Fitted, long-sleeved lace dress with a V-neck at the front, seam at the waist and open section at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Lined at the front and lined skirt.
Spooky pumpkin-shaped plastic bucket with a handle at the top.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Poncho in a soft jacquard knit with a ribbed polo neck and fringed hem.
Polo shirt in a textured premium cotton knit with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem.

Microfibre shaping briefs that hold in and shape the waist. High waist with elastication and a concealed silicone trim. Folded, glued seams around the leg openings for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.
Large metal earrings with tear-shaped plastic beads and fabric tassels. Length 7 cm.
Knee-length shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and an open chest pocket.
Jersey fancy dress costume with an accessory, a print motif on the front and a hook and loop fastening at the back.
Straight-style sweater vest in a wool knit with a V-neck, ribbed side sections, ribbing around the neckline and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Evening suit with a top and trousers in soft jersey. Top with a sewn-on bow tie, velvet lapels, buttons down the front and press-studs on one shoulder. Trousers with satin side stripes, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Elasticated waist with belt loops and a fake fly with a button.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an inner pocket. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Nursing top in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Hair claws in metal and plastic. Size 3.5 cm.
Fitted T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes.
Shopper in paper straw with two handles and a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 13x36x34 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuit, a pair of trousers and accessory in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Running vest top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Boxy-style T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short dress in sturdy cotton with wide shoulder straps, decorative buttons down the front and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short lace dress with a deep V-neck at the back and long sleeves. Scalloped trim at the back, cuffs and hem. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie/bow tie.
Short, straight-style dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and contrasting colour stripes down legs.
Jacquard-knit sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a small collar and zip down the front. Seamless.
Trainers in canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Platform 3 cm.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Jacquard-weave trousers in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend with a high drawstring waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fastening. Fitted at the top with concealed pockets in the side seams, welt back pockets and wide, straight legs with wide hems.

Blouse in woven fabric with inset lace trims, a small, frilled collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the back, frill trims over the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, lace-embroidered, buttoned cuffs.

Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with an inset lace trim at the front. Narrow cut with gathers at the top, short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and a flounce at the hem.
Knitted tube scarf.

Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Long-sleeved blouse in airy pattern-weave fabric with inset lace embroidery and pin-tucks at the front and on the sleeves. Buttons at the back, flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and a flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.
Round-necked blouse in a crinkled, embroidered viscose weave with buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and polarised, UV-protective lenses.
Cotton canvas hi-tops with a padded edge, hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Imitation suede sandals with an adjustable strap around the heel and braided jute trim around the sole. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform height approx. 5 cm.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Short yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves and a wrapover and open section at the back with a long tie at the hem.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist and sewn-on belt with a metal buckle at the front. Extended waistband with a concealed button, a zip fly and a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Short satin shorts with flounces at the front and an elasticated waist.

Set with a passport cover and luggage tag in grained imitation leather. The passport cover has three card compartments inside.Size 10.5x15 cm. The luggage tag has a narrow adjustable strap at the top with a metal buckle and metal pendant, and a transparent plastic pocket at the back with a removable label. Size approx 6.5x10.5 cm.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Joggers in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and tapered legs. Wide, elasticated jersey panel at the top for best fit over the tummy.
